root.name: Fluttabyes
root.description: GameplayThis game is a variation of the popular match-3 games like Bejeweled only with butterflies and you have to match ... 4 !You can match 7 or 11 butterflies to unlock specials.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 7, XP, Vista and 2000Processor: 350MHzMemory: 128MBHard Drive: 100MBGraphics: DirectX 7 CompatibleSound: DirectX 7 CompatibleDirectXÂ®: DirectX 7 or later
